episodes.title: The Crimes, Cheating & Lies That Built Diddy & Ashton's Hollywood Rat Pack
episodes.description:
Diddy & Ashton Kutcher have been friends for over 20 years, & after Diddy's arrest, it seems Ashton Kutcher & his wife Mila Kunis are trying to distance themselves from any association with Diddy. Especially after the disaster filled year they just had after writing letters of support for convicted serial monster Danny Masterson. In the early 2000’s, Diddy was already an a-lister, & while working on his hit show Making the Band with MTV, he met Hollywoods latest golden boy who also had a successful MTV show, Ashton Kutcher. Sean Combs & Ashton Kutcher created a fabricated story for how they met at MTV, but later in the video we’ll discuss the alleged real story, as this encounter with Diddy would set up over 20 years of friendship & showed P Diddy that Ashton Kutcher, supported by his best friend Danny Masterson could keep a secret. Combs & Kutcher connected immediately, & Diddy enjoyed spending time with Kutcher so much, he started inviting him to do everything friends would do together & much more. 

INTRO: 00:00-00:01 00:02-03:04
PART ONE: WHO ARE THE RAT PACK IN PRESENT DAY (CRIMES. ALLEGATIONS & LIES): 03:05-59:08
PART TWO: THE RAT PACKS HOLLYWOOD HEY DAYS: 59:09-01:47:23

In 2003 Combs also hit it off with Kutcher’s best friend Danny Masterson & combined with Kutcher and Mastersons fellow That 70’s Show costar, Wilmer Valderrama, Diddy formed a group with the three That 70’s Show stars & put himself at the centre, P Diddy dubbed them the new Hollywood rat pack.  In this video we'll discuss everything from the foundation of Diddy & Kutcher's relationship, their partying rat pack, business endeavours and their connections in present day. THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments!
*Amendment: I accidentally say FTC when I mean SEC regarding the fine Ashton & Mila received.

episodes.title: EVERYTHING You Don’t Know About The Twin Flames CULT (Forced Transitions, New Humans & Apocalypses)
episodes.description:
Twin Flames Universe is a cult lead by Jeff and Shaleia Divine (previously Jeff and Shaleia Ayan & many other names). They've been accused of brain washing, coercion, not paying people who work for them, forcing people to transition, telling their followers to stalk and harass their 'twin flame' & even telling people to violate restraining orders. Jeff and Shaleia are earning millions of dollars from their followers and all of the controversies surrounding them have caused the media to investigate their activity, journalists at Vanity Fair, Vice, and several others have dove into Jeff and Shaleia and Twin Flames Universe. In recent months, there has also been two docuseries released, Netflix's Escaping Twin Flames Universe & Amazon Prime's Desperately Seeking Soulmate - Escaping Twin Flames Universe. So today we'll be going over everything to do with Twin Flames Universe & the controversy surrounding Jeff and Shaleia - alleged coercion, brain washing, forced transition, not paying their workers, attempting to move all the followers to a privately purchased plot of land with hundreds of arches and so many other things. 
NOTE: This video is the result of research and everything is alleged and based on my personal opinion.

episodes.title: Everything You NEED To Know About Sister Wives (MLM's, Lies & Drama)
episodes.description:
00:00-00:01 00:02-03:05 Intro
03:06-14:17 Who Are The Brown Family? Life Before the Show
14:18-34:38 Family Dynamics
34:39-44:31 Money Problems & The Children
44:32-01:11:21 The MLM’s, My Sisterwife’s Closet & Health Insurance
01:11:22-01:31:34 The Future of the Show & Special Guest @realityamanda , @realiteasquad & Ace & Katelyn Fanning from the Sisterwives Podcast ‘Love Should Be Multiplied, Not Divided’
01:31:35-01:34:48 Conclusion 

Sister Wives is currently one of the most sucessful reality shows on television, and for 18 seasons viewers have follow the lives of Kody, Meri, Janelle, Christine, & Robyn Brown and their 18 children. In the early seasons of the show, the Browns tried to convince their audience that polygamy worked and that they were leading happy lives. Fast forward to today, and that premise has come crashing down, with three out of the four marriages failing and Kody barely speaking to any of his children. There's a lot of drama with Sister Wives, but also a lot of questionable behaviour, from predatory MLM's, money problems, the injuries and incidents that have happened to the kids on the show and just the all around awful behaviour by Kody Brown. Today we're going to be diving in to EVERYTHING you need to know about not only the Sister Wives show, but also the lives of Kody, Meri, Christine, Janelle and Robyn Brown outside of the show. I am also sitting down with some of the most beloved Sister Wives content creators towards the end of the video, so make sure you stick around for that! Thanks so much for watching!

episodes.title: Everything You DON'T Know About Danny Masterson & His Crimes
episodes.description:
Timestamps
00:00-00:01 Video starts
00:02-02:42 Intro
02:43-12:10 Chapter One - Who Is Danny Maqsterson?
12:11-26:24 Chapter Two - Accusations
26:25-55:52 Chapter Three - The Trial
55:53-01:04:28 Chapter Four - Verdict
01:04:29-01:36:40 Chapter Five - Sentencing &Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis Letter Backlash
01:36:41-01:47:25 Chapter Six - Aftermath, Civil Trial, Divorce & SP Declaration

Danny Masterson has been a stable on television for the last 25 years, from That 70's Show to Men at Work to The Ranch, most people are aware of who he is. He is also is best friends with his That 70's Show costars, Ashton Kutcher & Mila Kunis. Masterson may look to be another typical Hollywood celebrity, but behind the scenes he was attacking a large amount of women, many more than you’ve heard about in the mainstream media. Danny Masterson, along with his siblings Chris Masterson (Malcolm in the Middle) & Alanna Masterson (The Walking Dead), is a lifelong member of the Church of Scientology. This case has had a lot of publicity because of the celebrities attached to it but unless you have been following this trial day after day from the people who were in court and following it all extremely closely, I think you’ll be surprised by what really went on. The investigation took over seven years, and Leah Remini even put out a special episode of Leah Remini: Scientology & the Aftermath, covering Masterson's attacks on multiple women. This video will go over everything about Masterson, the accusations, trial, outcome, aftermath and more. Let me know your thoughts in the comments and a huge thank you to @GrowingUpInScientology who attended the Danny Masterson trial everyday and provided live updates throughout the trial.

*TRIGGER WARNING ABUSE, SA, SH, HARM TO OTHERS, CULTS ALL THE THINGS! HEAVY SUBJECT MATTER*
Welcome to a new video, today we are talking about the rise and fall of Allison Mack. Mack went from the star of a Disney Channel movie, to the lead on one of the first superhero shows on The WB, & later The CW, to second in command of a cult, NXIVM. Mack was second only to Keith Raniere, together they ran a pyramid scheme and then, a s*x cult. We are going over everything that happened on Mack's rise, her path at NXIVM, what happened after everything fell apart and how she became inmate no 90838-053. Thank you for watching!
